references: Related: CF 281786. Amending: Ord 48022, Ord 75088, Ord 85500. Repealing: Ord 90659, 98134.
summary: AN ORDINANCE repealing Sections 332, 333, 334 and 335 of Ordinance 48022 (License Code) and Ordinances 90659 and 98134 which provide for the licensing and regulation of Heating Equipment Dealers.
